name: Future Fusion (Pre-Errata)
text: Reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and send the Fusion Materials listed on it from your Main Deck to the GY. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card's activation: Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck with the same name as the monster you revealed and target it with this card. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.) When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.
